apis.description: Returns a list of group categories in a context

operations.summary: List group categories for a context
operations.notes: Returns a list of group categories in a context

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.description: ID

apis.description:
Returns the data for a single group category, or a 401 if the caller doesn't have
the rights to see it.

operations.notes:
Returns the data for a single group category, or a 401 if the caller doesn't have
the rights to see it.

parameters.name: group_category_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the group category

parameters.name: self_signup
parameters.description: Allow students to sign up for a group themselves (Course Only). valid values are: "enabled":: allows students to self sign up for any group in course "restricted":: allows students to self sign up only for groups in the same section null disallows self sign up

parameters.name: group_limit
parameters.description: Limit the maximum number of users in each group (Course Only). Requires self signup.

parameters.name: create_group_count
parameters.description: Create this number of groups (Course Only).

parameters.name: split_group_count
parameters.description: (Deprecated) Create this number of groups, and evenly distribute students among them. not allowed with "enable_self_signup". because the group assignment happens synchronously, it's recommended that you instead use the assign_unassigned_members endpoint. (Course Only)

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the group category

parameters.name: self_signup
parameters.description: Allow students to sign up for a group themselves (Course Only). valid values are: "enabled":: allows students to self sign up for any group in course "restricted":: allows students to self sign up only for groups in the same section null disallows self sign up

parameters.name: group_limit
parameters.description: Limit the maximum number of users in each group (Course Only). Requires self signup.

parameters.name: create_group_count
parameters.description: Create this number of groups (Course Only).

parameters.name: split_group_count
parameters.description: (Deprecated) Create this number of groups, and evenly distribute students among them. not allowed with "enable_self_signup". because the group assignment happens synchronously, it's recommended that you instead use the assign_unassigned_members endpoint. (Course Only)

parameters.name: group_limit
parameters.description: Limit the maximum number of users in each group (Course Only). Requires self signup.

parameters.name: create_group_count

parameters.name: split_group_count
parameters.description: (Deprecated) Create this number of groups, and evenly distribute students among them. not allowed with "enable_self_signup". because the group assignment happens synchronously, it's recommended that you instead use the assign_unassigned_members endpoint. (Course Only)

apis.description:
Deletes a group category and all groups under it. Protected group
categories can not be deleted, i.e. "communities", "student_organized", and "imported".

operations.notes:
Deletes a group category and all groups under it. Protected group
categories can not be deleted, i.e. "communities", "student_organized", and "imported".

parameters.name: group_category_id
parameters.description: ID

apis.description: Returns a list of groups in a group category

operations.notes: Returns a list of groups in a group category

parameters.name: group_category_id
parameters.description: ID

apis.description: Returns a list of users in the group category.

operations.notes: Returns a list of users in the group category.

parameters.name: group_category_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: The partial name or full ID of the users to match and return in the results list. Must be at least 3 characters.

parameters.name: unassigned
parameters.description: Set this value to true if you wish only to search unassigned users in the group category.

apis.description:
Assign all unassigned members as evenly as possible among the existing
student groups.

operations.notes:
Assign all unassigned members as evenly as possible among the existing
student groups.

parameters.name: group_category_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: sync
parameters.description: The assigning is done asynchronously by default. If you would like to override this and have the assigning done synchronously, set this value to true.
